about_the_game:
Deckmancers, an action roguelite, fuses melee combat with card-based spellcasting, challenging you to think fast and cast faster. Duel with magic cards and clash with cold steel as you journey through shattered realms. Go solo or team up with your buddies to battle through fantastic beasts and rival mages on your way to conquer the arcane tournament.

Arcane Deckbuilding

When played, each card casts one spell, be it a blazing fireball, sheep-turning curse, or resurrection and summon sorcery.
Experiment with card combinations to build an unstoppable deck, obliterating any confrontation you encounter on your journey.
Equip Joker cards with rule-bending effects, offering a new twist on casting spells, and create powerful combos, utilizing unique cards from slain towering bosses or bought from traveling traders.

Spellblade Mayhem

Master the art of magical combat by combining spellcasting and melee attacks. Wield your deck as a weapon, casting spells to devastate foes from afar, then close in with your blade to finish the job. Stay in constant motion to survive the onslaught of enemies and environmental hazards that test your reflexes, tactical thinking, and deckbuilding skills.
All in a handcrafted environment with procedurally generated threats, across lands shattered by magic cataclysm.

The Arcane Tournament

Your journey culminates in the arcane tournament, where your collected deck of cards and hard-earned skills face the ultimate gauntlet, to prove your mastery of magic and combat.
And if you fail, defeat serves as a stepping stone to greater power.
Unlock new cards and deckmancers with each attempt, gradually expanding your magical collection with more effects to combine, for even more surprising and varied synergies.

short_description: Deckmancers, an action melee roguelite, blends deckbuilding with spell-slinging & sword-swinging chaos. Build arcane decks, play cards to cast powerful spells & cut through hordes of fantastic beasts. Journey through shattered realms, solo or in co-op, to conquer the arcane tournament.
